item.title: Season 7
item.description:
Season 7: Retrospective

Season 7 of the Optimism Grants has concluded. Submissions closed on July 15th, 2024.

Season 7 Highlights

  • Total Grants Awarded: 47
  • Total Funding Distributed: $2.8M
  • Applications Received: 312
  • Success Rate: 15%

Key Focus Areas

Season 7 prioritized:

Season 9 â€“ Grants Council

The Grants Council funds projects that grow Superchain adoption by increasing DEX liquidity in priority pairs and the fees generated from trading those pairs.
